query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS validationViolations (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ruleId INT NOT NULL,
  projectId INT NOT NULL,
  entityType ENUM('businessCapability', 'application', 'businessProcess', 'dataEntity', 'requirement') NOT NULL,
  entityId INT NOT NULL,
  entityName VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  violationDetails JSON NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('open', 'resolved', 'ignored') DEFAULT 'open' NOT NULL,
  resolvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  resolvedBy INT NULL,
  resolutionNotes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (ruleId) REFERENCES validationRules(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (projectId) REFERENCES projects(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (resolvedBy) REFERENCES users(id),
  INDEX validation_violations_rule_idx (ruleId),
  INDEX validation_violations_project_idx (projectId),
  INDEX validation_violations_entity_idx (entityType, entityId),
  INDEX validation_violations_status_idx (projectId, status)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user MCXikgkEWzjEGDB.4f9baeb9deaf --database fq5wr6YzXYEsLcWqw7mDwv --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS validationViolations (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ruleId INT NOT NULL,
  projectId INT NOT NULL,
  entityType ENUM('businessCapability', 'application', 'businessProcess', 'dataEntity', 'requirement') NOT NULL,
  entityId INT NOT NULL,
  entityName VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  violationDetails JSON NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('open', 'resolved', 'ignored') DEFAULT 'open' NOT NULL,
  resolvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  resolvedBy INT NULL,
  resolutionNotes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (ruleId) REFERENCES validationRules(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (projectId) REFERENCES projects(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (resolvedBy) REFERENCES users(id),
  INDEX validation_violations_rule_idx (ruleId),
  INDEX validation_violations_project_idx (projectId),
  INDEX validation_violations_entity_idx (entityType, entityId),
  INDEX validation_violations_status_idx (projectId, status)
)
